channel.title: Changing from NPC and Renaming?

item.title: Changing from NPC and Renaming?
item.dc:creator: @jurm jurm
item.description:
@jurm wrote:

[quote=“zoltanman, post:4, topic:127336”][quote author=Dell link=topic=177890.msg1630168#msg1630168 date=1185516290]
try adding else if voids, so if it dies it can spawn another npc
[/quote]

Lol, don’t ever help somebody when you don’t even know what a void is.

To re-name item’s, you have to edit the client, and you have to item mask.[/quote]

Thanks! Now, how do I get the player to change back to a human if one of the items is taken off? (Code on first post)[br][size=1]Posted on: July 27, 2007, 05:56:04 AM[/size][hr]Bump

Read full topic

item.title: Changing from NPC and Renaming?

item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

Dell:

try adding else if voids, so if it dies it can spawn another npc

Lol, don’t ever help somebody when you don’t even know what a void is.

To re-name item’s, you have to edit the client, and you have to item mask.

item.title: Changing from NPC and Renaming?
item.dc:creator: @jurm jurm
item.description:
@jurm wrote:

Well, the thing is it uses h’ween masks to change your character from a human to a dragon, while you are also wearing dragonstone ring and amulet. I cannot get an else if to change it back properly, when I get one on there it keeps the Green and Blue from working.[br][size=1]Posted on: July 26, 2007, 05:16:26 PM[/size][hr]Bump[br][size=1]Posted on: July 26, 2007, 06:02:11 PM[/size][hr]Bump?

Read full topic

item.title: Changing from NPC and Renaming?
item.dc:creator: @jurm jurm
item.description:
@jurm wrote:

//Green Dragon if(playerEquipment[playerHat] == 1053 == true && playerEquipment[playerRing] == 1645 == true && playerEquipment[playerAmulet] == 1702 == true) { npcId = 941; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } //Blue Dragon if(playerEquipment[playerHat] == 1055 == true && playerEquipment[playerRing] == 1645 == true && playerEquipment[playerAmulet] == 1702 == true) { npcId = 55; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } //Red Dragon if(playerEquipment[playerHat] == 1057 == true && playerEquipment[playerRing] == 1645 == true && playerEquipment[playerAmulet] == 1702 == true) { npcId = 53; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

The 2 codes I tried only allowed the change to Red Dragon, and not let me change back into the other 2. Help please? I would also like to know how to rename an item? I am using testscape as a base.[br][size=1]Posted on: July 26, 2007, 02:10:44 PM[/size][hr]Bump

Read full topic
